Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: ACCOUNT_CREATED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when a new account is created on the network.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: ACCOUNT_REMOVED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when an account is removed from the network.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: ACCOUNT_CREDITED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when an account receives a payment or asset.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: ACCOUNT_DEBITED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when an account sends a payment or asset.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: ACCOUNT_THRESHOLDS_UPDATED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when account thresholds are modified.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: ACCOUNT_HOME_DOMAIN_UPDATED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when an account’s home domain is changed.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: ACCOUNT_FLAGS_UPDATED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when account flags are modified.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: SIGNER_CREATED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when a new signer is added to an account.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: SIGNER_REMOVED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when a signer is removed from an account.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: SIGNER_UPDATED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when a signer’s weight is modified.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: TRUSTLINE_CREATED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when a new trustline is established.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: TRUSTLINE_REMOVED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when a trustline is removed.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: TRUSTLINE_UPDATED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when trustline properties are modified.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: TRUSTLINE_AUTHORIZED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when a trustline is authorized by the asset issuer.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: TRUSTLINE_DEAUTHORIZED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when a trustline authorization is revoked by the asset issuer.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: OFFER_CREATED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when a new offer is created on the DEX.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: OFFER_REMOVED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when an offer is removed from the DEX.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: OFFER_UPDATED
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when an offer is modified on the DEX.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: TRADE
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when a trade is executed on the DEX.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: MANAGE_DATA
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when account data is set or modified.

Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.name: BUMP_SEQUENCE
Structs/EffectTypeAsString.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Effect when an account’s sequence number is bumped.

Structs/AssetTypeAsString.html#/s:10stel.name: CREDIT_ALPHANUM4
Structs/AssetTypeAsString.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Asset type for assets with codes 1-4 characters long.

Structs/AssetTypeAsString.html#/s:10stel.name: CREDIT_ALPHANUM12
Structs/AssetTypeAsString.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Asset type for assets with codes 5-12 characters long.

Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.name: accountId
Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.abstract: (optional) The account the user should send its token back to. This field can be omitted if the anchor cannot provide this information at the time of the request.

Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.name: memoType
Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.abstract: (optional) type of memo to attach to transaction, one of text, id or hash

Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.name: memo
Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.abstract: (optional) Value of memo to attach to transaction, for hash this should be base64-encoded. The anchor should use this memo to match the Stellar transaction with the database entry associated created to represent it.

Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.name: id
Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.abstract: (optional) The anchor’s ID for this withdrawal. The wallet will use this ID to query the /transaction endpoint to check status of the request.

Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.name: eta
Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.abstract: (optional) Estimate of how long the withdrawal will take to credit in seconds.

Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.name: minAmount
Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.abstract: (optional) Minimum amount of an asset that a user can withdraw.

Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.name: maxAmount
Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.abstract: (optional) Maximum amount of asset that a user can withdraw.

Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.name: feeFixed
Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.abstract: (optional) If there is a fee for withdraw. In units of the withdrawn asset.

Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.name: feePercent
Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.abstract: (optional) If there is a percent fee for withdraw.

Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.name: extraInfo
Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.abstract: (optional) Any additional data needed as an input for this withdraw, example: Bank Name.

Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.name: init(from:)
Structs/WithdrawResponse.html#/s:10stell.abstract: Initializer - creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/ExtraInfo.html#/s:10stellarsdk9E.name: message
Structs/ExtraInfo.html#/s:10stellarsdk9E.abstract: (optional) Additional details about the deposit process.

Structs/ExtraInfo.html#/s:10stellarsdk9E.name: init(from:)
Structs/ExtraInfo.html#/s:10stellarsdk9E.abstract: Initializer - creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/DepositInstruction.html#/s:10ste.name: description
Structs/DepositInstruction.html#/s:10ste.abstract: A human-readable description of the field. This can be used by an anchor

Structs/DepositInstruction.html#/s:10ste.name: init(from:)
Structs/DepositInstruction.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Initializer - creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.name: how
Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.abstract: (Deprecated, use instructions instead) Terse but complete instructions for how to deposit the asset. In the case of most cryptocurrencies it is just an address to which the deposit should be sent.

Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.name: instructions
Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.abstract: (optional) JSON object containing the SEP-9 financial account fields that describe how to complete the off-chain deposit.

Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.name: id
Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.abstract: (optional) The anchor’s ID for this deposit. The wallet will use this ID to query the /transaction endpoint to check status of the request.

Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.name: eta
Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.abstract: (optional) Estimate of how long the deposit will take to credit in seconds.

Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.name: minAmount
Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.abstract: (optional) Minimum amount of an asset that a user can deposit.

Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.name: maxAmount
Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.abstract: (optional) Maximum amount of asset that a user can deposit.

Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.name: feeFixed
Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.abstract: (optional) Fixed fee (if any). In units of the deposited asset.

Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.name: feePercent
Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.abstract: (optional) Percentage fee (if any). In units of percentage points.

Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.name: extraInfo
Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.abstract: (optional) Any additional data needed as an input for this deposit, example: Bank Name

Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.name: init(from:)
Structs/DepositResponse.html#/s:10stella.abstract: Initializer - creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/CustomerInformationStatus.html#/.name: status
Structs/CustomerInformationStatus.html#/.abstract: Status of customer information processing. One of: pending, denied

Structs/CustomerInformationStatus.html#/.name: moreInfoUrl
Structs/CustomerInformationStatus.html#/.abstract: (optional) A URL the user can visit if they want more information about their account / status. If lang was passed in the request, a lang query parameter should be added to the URL with the same value.

Structs/CustomerInformationStatus.html#/.name: eta

Structs/Refunds.html#/s:10stellarsdk7Ref.name: amountFee
Structs/Refunds.html#/s:10stellarsdk7Ref.abstract: The total amount charged in fees for processing all refund payments, in units of amount_in_asset. The sum of all fee values in the payments object list should equal this value.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: id
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Unique, anchor-generated id for the deposit/withdrawal

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: kind
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: deposit, deposit-exchange, withdrawal or withdrawal-exchange.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: status
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Processing status of deposit/withdrawal

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: statusEta
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) Estimated number of seconds until a status change is expected.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: moreInfoUrl
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) A URL the user can visit if they want more information about their account / status.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: amountIn
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) Amount received by anchor at start of transaction as a string with up to 7 decimals. Excludes any fees charged before the anchor received the funds. Should be equals to quote.sell_asset if a quote_id was used.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: amountInAsset
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) The asset received or to be received by the Anchor. Must be present if the deposit/withdraw was made using quotes. The value must be in SEP-38 Asset Identification Format.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: amountOut
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) Amount sent by anchor to user at end of transaction as a string with up to 7 decimals. Excludes amount converted to XLM to fund account and any external fees. Should be equals to quote.buy_asset if a quote_id was used.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: amountOutAsset
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) The asset delivered or to be delivered to the user. Must be present if the deposit/withdraw was made using quotes. The value must be in SEP-38 Asset Identification Format.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: amountFee
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (deprecated, optional) Amount of fee charged by anchor. Should be equals to quote.fee.total if a quote_id was used.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: amountFeeAsset
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (deprecated, optional) The asset in which fees are calculated in. Must be present if the deposit/withdraw was made using quotes. The value must be in SEP-38 Asset Identification Format. Should be equals to quote.fee.asset if a quote_id was used.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: feeDetails
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Description of fee charged by the anchor. If quote_id is present, it should match the referenced quote’s fee object.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: quoteId
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) The ID of the quote used to create this transaction. Should be present if a quote_id was included in the POST /transactions request. Clients should be aware though that the quote_id may not be present in older implementations.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: from
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) Sent from address (perhaps BTC, IBAN, or bank account in the case of a deposit, Stellar address in the case of a withdrawal).

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: to
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) Sent to address (perhaps BTC, IBAN, or bank account in the case of a withdrawal, Stellar address in the case of a deposit).

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: externalExtra
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) Extra information for the external account involved. It could be a bank routing number, BIC, or store number for example.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: externalExtraText
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) Text version of external_extra. This is the name of the bank or store.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: depositMemo
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) If this is a deposit, this is the memo (if any) used to transfer the asset to the to Stellar address

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: depositMemoType
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) Type for the deposit_memo.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: withdrawAnchorAccount
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) If this is a withdrawal, this is the anchor’s Stellar account that the user transferred (or will transfer) their issued asset to.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: withdrawMemo
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) Memo used when the user transferred to withdraw_anchor_account.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: withdrawMemoType
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) Memo type for withdraw_memo.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: startedAt
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) start date and time of transaction

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: updatedAt
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) The date and time of transaction reaching the current status.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: completedAt
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) completion date and time of transaction

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: userActionRequiredBy
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) The date and time by when the user action is required. In certain statuses, such as pending_user_transfer_start or incomplete, anchor waits for the user action and

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: stellarTransactionId
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) transaction_id on Stellar network of the transfer that either completed the deposit or started the withdrawal

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: externalTransactionId
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) ID of transaction on external network that either started the deposit or completed the withdrawal

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: message
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) Human readable explanation of transaction status, if needed.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: refunded
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (deprecated, optional) This field is deprecated in favor of the refunds object. True if the transaction was refunded in full. False if the transaction was partially refunded or not refunded. For more details about any refunds, see the refunds object.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: refunds
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) An object describing any on or off-chain refund associated with this transaction.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: requiredInfoMessage
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) A human-readable message indicating any errors that require updated information from the user.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: requiredInfoUpdates
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) A set of fields that require update from the user described in the same format as /info. This field is only relevant when status is pending_transaction_info_update

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: instructions
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) JSON object containing the SEP-9 financial account fields that describe how to complete the off-chain deposit in the same format as the /deposit response. This field should be present if the instructions were provided in the /deposit response or if it could not have been previously provided synchronously. This field should only be present once the status becomes pending_user_transfer_start, not while the transaction has any statuses that precede it such as incomplete, pending_anchor, or pending_customer_info_update.

Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.name: claimableBalanceId
Structs/AnchorTransaction.html#/s:10stel.abstract: (optional) ID of the Claimable Balance used to send the asset initially requested. Only relevant for deposit transactions.

Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.abstract: An object describing any on or off-chain refund associated with this transaction.

Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.abstract: In case of deposit: Sent from address, perhaps BTC, IBAN, or bank account.

Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.name: to
Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.abstract: In case of deposit: Stellar address the deposited assets were sent to.

Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.name: depositMemo
Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.abstract: This is the memo (if any) used to transfer the asset to the to Stellar address. Deposit transactions only.

Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.name: depositMemoType
Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.abstract: Type for the deposit_memo. Deposit transactions only.

Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.name: claimableBalanceId
Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.abstract: ID of the Claimable Balance used to send the asset initially requested. Deposit transactions only.

Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.name: withdrawAnchorAccount
Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.abstract: If this is a withdrawal, this is the anchor’s Stellar account that the user transferred (or will transfer) their asset to. Withdrawal transactions only.

Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.name: withdrawMemo
Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.abstract: Memo used when the user transferred to withdraw_anchor_account.

Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.name: withdrawMemoType
Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.abstract: Memo type for withdraw_memo. Withdrawal transactions only.

Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.name: init(from:)
Structs/Sep24Transaction.html#/s:10stell.abstract: Creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/Sep24TransactionResponse.html#/s.name: init(from:)
Structs/Sep24TransactionResponse.html#/s.abstract: Creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/Sep24TransactionsResponse.html#/.name: init(from:)
Structs/Sep24TransactionsResponse.html#/.abstract: Creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/Sep24InteractiveResponse.html#/s.name: url
Structs/Sep24InteractiveResponse.html#/s.abstract: URL hosted by the anchor. The wallet should show this URL to the user as a popup.

Structs/Sep24InteractiveResponse.html#/s.name: id
Structs/Sep24InteractiveResponse.html#/s.abstract: The anchor’s internal ID for this deposit / withdrawal request. The wallet will use this ID to query the /transaction endpoint to check status of the request.

Structs/Sep24InteractiveResponse.html#/s.name: init(from:)
Structs/Sep24InteractiveResponse.html#/s.abstract: Creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/Sep24FeatureFlags.html#/s:10stel.name: accountCreation
Structs/Sep24FeatureFlags.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Whether or not the anchor supports creating accounts for users requesting deposits. Defaults to true.

Structs/Sep24FeatureFlags.html#/s:10stel.name: claimableBalances
Structs/Sep24FeatureFlags.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Whether or not the anchor supports sending deposit funds as claimable balances. This is relevant for users of Stellar accounts without a trustline to the requested asset. Defaults to false.

Structs/Sep24FeatureFlags.html#/s:10stel.name: init(from:)
Structs/Sep24FeatureFlags.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/Sep24FeeEndpointInfo.html#/s:10s.name: authenticationRequired
Structs/Sep24FeeEndpointInfo.html#/s:10s.abstract: True if client must be authenticated before accessing the fee endpoint.

Structs/Sep24FeeEndpointInfo.html#/s:10s.name: init(from:)
Structs/Sep24FeeEndpointInfo.html#/s:10s.abstract: Creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawAsset.html#/s:10ste.name: enabled
Structs/Sep24WithdrawAsset.html#/s:10ste.abstract: True if withdrawal for this asset is supported.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawAsset.html#/s:10ste.name: minAmount
Structs/Sep24WithdrawAsset.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Minimum withdrawal amount. No limit if not specified.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawAsset.html#/s:10ste.name: maxAmount
Structs/Sep24WithdrawAsset.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Maximum withdrawal amount. No limit if not specified.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawAsset.html#/s:10ste.name: feeFixed
Structs/Sep24WithdrawAsset.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Fixed (base) fee for withdraw. In units of the withdrawn asset. This is in addition to any fee_percent.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawAsset.html#/s:10ste.name: feePercent
Structs/Sep24WithdrawAsset.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Percentage fee for withdraw in percentage points. This is in addition to any fee_fixed.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawAsset.html#/s:10ste.name: feeMinimum
Structs/Sep24WithdrawAsset.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Minimum fee in units of the withdrawn asset.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawAsset.html#/s:10ste.name: init(from:)
Structs/Sep24WithdrawAsset.html#/s:10ste.abstract: Creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/Sep24DepositAsset.html#/s:10stel.name: enabled
Structs/Sep24DepositAsset.html#/s:10stel.abstract: True if deposit for this asset is supported.

Structs/Sep24DepositAsset.html#/s:10stel.name: minAmount
Structs/Sep24DepositAsset.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Minimum deposit amount. No limit if not specified.

Structs/Sep24DepositAsset.html#/s:10stel.name: maxAmount
Structs/Sep24DepositAsset.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Maximum deposit amount. No limit if not specified.

Structs/Sep24DepositAsset.html#/s:10stel.name: feeFixed
Structs/Sep24DepositAsset.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Fixed (base) fee for deposit. In units of the deposited asset. This is in addition to any fee_percent. Omitted if there is no fee or the fee schedule is complex.

Structs/Sep24DepositAsset.html#/s:10stel.name: feePercent
Structs/Sep24DepositAsset.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Percentage fee for deposit. In percentage points. This is in addition to any fee_fixed. Omitted if there is no fee or the fee schedule is complex.

Structs/Sep24DepositAsset.html#/s:10stel.name: feeMinimum
Structs/Sep24DepositAsset.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Minimum fee in units of the deposited asset.

Structs/Sep24DepositAsset.html#/s:10stel.name: init(from:)
Structs/Sep24DepositAsset.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/Sep24InfoResponse.html#/s:10stel.name: depositAssets
Structs/Sep24InfoResponse.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Dictionary of assets supported for deposit, keyed by asset code.

Structs/Sep24InfoResponse.html#/s:10stel.name: withdrawAssets
Structs/Sep24InfoResponse.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Dictionary of assets supported for withdrawal, keyed by asset code.

Structs/Sep24InfoResponse.html#/s:10stel.name: feeEndpointInfo
Structs/Sep24InfoResponse.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Information about the fee endpoint if available.

Structs/Sep24InfoResponse.html#/s:10stel.name: featureFlags
Structs/Sep24InfoResponse.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Feature flags indicating which optional features are supported.

Structs/Sep24InfoResponse.html#/s:10stel.name: init(from:)
Structs/Sep24InfoResponse.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/Sep24FeeResponse.html#/s:10stell.name: fee
Structs/Sep24FeeResponse.html#/s:10stell.abstract: The total fee (in units of the asset involved) that would be charged to deposit/withdraw the specified amount of asset_code.

Structs/Sep24FeeResponse.html#/s:10stell.name: init(from:)
Structs/Sep24FeeResponse.html#/s:10stell.abstract: Creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: jwt
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: JWT previously received from the anchor via the SEP-10 authentication flow.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: assetCode
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: Code of the asset the user wants to withdraw. The value passed must match one of the codes listed in the /info response’s withdraw object.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: assetIssuer
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: The issuer of the stellar asset the user wants to withdraw with the anchor.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: destinationAsset
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: String in Asset Identification Format - The asset user wants to receive. It’s an off-chain or fiat asset.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: amount
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: Amount of asset requested to withdraw. If this is not provided it will be collected in the interactive flow.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: quoteId
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: The id returned from a SEP-38 POST /quote response.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: account
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: The Stellar (G…) or muxed account (M…) the client wants to use as the destination of the payment sent by the anchor.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: memo
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: Deprecated. This field was originally intended to differentiate users of the same Stellar account.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: memoType
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: Deprecated. Type of memo. One of text, id or hash. Deprecated because memos used to identify users of the same Stellar account should always be of type of id.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: walletName
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: In communications / pages about the withdrawal, anchor should display the wallet name to the user to explain where funds are coming from.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: walletUrl
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: Anchor can show this to the user when referencing the wallet involved in the withdrawal (ex. in the anchor’s transaction history).

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: lang
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: Defaults to en if not specified or if the specified language is not supported.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: refundMemo
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: The memo the anchor must use when sending refund payments back to the user.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: refundMemoType
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: The type of the refund_memo. Can be id, text, or hash.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: kycFields
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: One or more of the KYC fields for natural persons as listed in SEP-9.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: kycOrganizationFields
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: One or more of the KYC fields for organizations as listed in SEP-9.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: kycFinancialAccountFields
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: One or more of the KYC fields for financial accounts as listed in SEP-9.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: customFields
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: Additional custom fields to be added to the request.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: customFiles
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: Additional custom files to be added to the request.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: init(jwt:assetCode:)
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: Creates a new withdrawal request.

Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.name: toParameters()
Structs/Sep24WithdrawRequest.html#/s:10s.abstract: Converts the request parameters to a dictionary of data for multipart form submission.

Structs/Sep24TransactionsRequest.html#/s.name: jwt
Structs/Sep24TransactionsRequest.html#/s.abstract: JWT previously received from the anchor via the SEP-10 authentication flow.

Structs/Sep24TransactionsRequest.html#/s.name: assetCode
Structs/Sep24TransactionsRequest.html#/s.abstract: The code of the asset of interest. E.g. BTC, ETH, USD, INR, etc.

Structs/Sep24TransactionsRequest.html#/s.name: noOlderThan
Structs/Sep24TransactionsRequest.html#/s.abstract: The response should contain transactions starting on or after this date and time.

Structs/Sep24TransactionsRequest.html#/s.name: limit
Structs/Sep24TransactionsRequest.html#/s.abstract: The response should contain at most limit transactions.

Structs/Sep24TransactionsRequest.html#/s.name: kind
Structs/Sep24TransactionsRequest.html#/s.abstract: The kind of transaction that is desired. Should be either deposit or withdrawal.

Structs/Sep24TransactionsRequest.html#/s.name: pagingId
Structs/Sep24TransactionsRequest.html#/s.abstract: The response should contain transactions starting prior to this ID (exclusive).

Structs/Sep24TransactionsRequest.html#/s.name: lang
Structs/Sep24TransactionsRequest.html#/s.abstract: Defaults to en if not specified or if the specified language is not supported.

Structs/Sep24TransactionRequest.html#/s:.name: jwt
Structs/Sep24TransactionRequest.html#/s:.abstract: JWT previously received from the anchor via the SEP-10 authentication flow.

Structs/Sep24TransactionRequest.html#/s:.name: stellarTransactionId
Structs/Sep24TransactionRequest.html#/s:.abstract: The stellar transaction id of the transaction.

Structs/Sep24TransactionRequest.html#/s:.name: externalTransactionId
Structs/Sep24TransactionRequest.html#/s:.abstract: The external transaction id of the transaction.

Structs/Sep24TransactionRequest.html#/s:.name: lang
Structs/Sep24TransactionRequest.html#/s:.abstract: Defaults to en if not specified or if the specified language is not supported.

Structs/Sep24FeeRequest.html#/s:10stella.name: type
Structs/Sep24FeeRequest.html#/s:10stella.abstract: Type of deposit or withdrawal (SEPA, bank_account, cash, etc.).

Structs/Sep24FeeRequest.html#/s:10stella.name: amount
Structs/Sep24FeeRequest.html#/s:10stella.abstract: Amount of the asset that will be deposited/withdrawn.

Structs/Sep24FeeRequest.html#/s:10stella.name: jwt
Structs/Sep24FeeRequest.html#/s:10stella.abstract: JWT previously received from the anchor via the SEP-10 authentication flow.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: jwt
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: JWT previously received from the anchor via the SEP-10 authentication flow.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: assetCode
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: The code of the stellar asset the user wants to receive for their deposit with the anchor.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: assetIssuer
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: The issuer of the stellar asset the user wants to receive for their deposit with the anchor.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: sourceAsset
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: String in Asset Identification Format - The asset user wants to send. Note, that this is the asset user initially holds (off-chain or fiat asset).

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: amount
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: Amount of asset requested to deposit. If this is not provided it will be collected in the interactive flow.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: quoteId
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: The id returned from a SEP-38 POST /quote response.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: account
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: The Stellar (G…) or muxed account (M…) the client will use as the source of the withdrawal payment to the anchor.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: memo
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: Value of memo to attach to transaction, for hash this should be base64-encoded.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: memoType
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: Type of memo that anchor should attach to the Stellar payment transaction, one of text, id or hash.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: walletName
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: In communications / pages about the deposit, anchor should display the wallet name to the user to explain where funds are going.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: walletUrl
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: Anchor should link to this when notifying the user that the transaction has completed.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: lang
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: Defaults to en if not specified or if the specified language is not supported.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: claimableBalanceSupported
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: “true” if the client supports receiving deposit transactions as a claimable balance, false otherwise.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: kycFields
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: One or more of the KYC fields for natural persons as listed in SEP-9.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: kycOrganizationFields
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: One or more of the KYC fields for organizations as listed in SEP-9.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: kycFinancialAccountFields
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: One or more of the KYC fields for financial accounts as listed in SEP-9.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: customFields
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: Additional custom fields to be added to the request.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: customFiles
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: Additional custom files to be added to the request.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: init(jwt:assetCode:)
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: Creates a new deposit request.

Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.name: toParameters()
Structs/Sep24DepositRequest.html#/s:10st.abstract: Converts the request parameters to a dictionary of data for multipart form submission.

Structs/ResolveAddressResponse.html#/s:1.name: accountId
Structs/ResolveAddressResponse.html#/s:1.abstract: The Stellar account ID (public key) associated with the address.

Structs/ResolveAddressResponse.html#/s:1.name: memoType
Structs/ResolveAddressResponse.html#/s:1.abstract: The type of memo that must be attached to transactions sent to this address.

Structs/ResolveAddressResponse.html#/s:1.name: memo
Structs/ResolveAddressResponse.html#/s:1.abstract: The memo value that must be attached to transactions sent to this address.

Structs/ResolveAddressResponse.html#/s:1.name: init(from:)
Structs/ResolveAddressResponse.html#/s:1.abstract: Initializer - creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder.

Structs/Ed25519Derivation.html#/s:10stel.name: chainCode
Structs/Ed25519Derivation.html#/s:10stel.abstract: The chain code used for deriving child keys (32 bytes).

Structs/Ed25519Derivation.html#/s:10stel.name: init(seed:)
Structs/Ed25519Derivation.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Initializes the root derivation node from a BIP-39 seed.

Structs/Ed25519Derivation.html#/s:10stel.name: derived(at:)
Structs/Ed25519Derivation.html#/s:10stel.abstract: Derives a child key at the specified hardened index.

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: ED25519_PUBLIC_KEY_SIZE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Size of an Ed25519 public key in bytes (32 bytes)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: ED25519_SEED_SIZE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Size of an Ed25519 seed in bytes (32 bytes)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: ED25519_PRIVATE_KEY_SIZE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Size of an Ed25519 private key in bytes (64 bytes)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: ED25519_SIGNATURE_SIZE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Size of an Ed25519 signature in bytes (64 bytes)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: SHA256_HASH_SIZE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Size of SHA-256 hash in bytes (32 bytes)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: STRKEY_VERSION_BYTE_SIZE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Size of the version byte in StrKey encoding (1 byte)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: STRKEY_CHECKSUM_SIZE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Size of the CRC-16 checksum in StrKey encoding (2 bytes)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: STRKEY_OVERHEAD_SIZE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Total overhead size in StrKey encoding (version byte + checksum = 3 bytes)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: STRKEY_ENCODED_LENGTH_STANDARD
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Standard StrKey encoded string length for ed25519PublicKey, ed25519SecretSeed,

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: STRKEY_ENCODED_LENGTH_MUXED
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: StrKey encoded string length for muxed account (med25519PublicKey) (69 characters)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: STRKEY_ENCODED_LENGTH_CLAIMABLE_BALANCE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: StrKey encoded string length for claimable balance (58 characters)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: STRKEY_SIGNED_PAYLOAD_MIN_LENGTH
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Minimum StrKey encoded string length for signed payload (69 characters)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: STRKEY_ENCODED_LENGTH_SIGNED_PAYLOAD_MAX
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Maximum StrKey encoded string length for signed payload (165 characters)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: STRKEY_DECODED_SIZE_STANDARD
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Standard decoded payload size for StrKey types (32 bytes)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: STRKEY_DECODED_SIZE_MUXED
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Decoded payload size for muxed account (40 bytes = 32 bytes key + 8 bytes ID)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: MUXED_ACCOUNT_ID_SIZE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Size of the muxed account ID field (8 bytes)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: SIGNED_PAYLOAD_SIGNER_SIZE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Size of the signer public key in a signed payload (32 bytes)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: SIGNED_PAYLOAD_SIZE_FIELD
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Size of the payload length field in a signed payload (4 bytes)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: SIGNED_PAYLOAD_MIN_PAYLOAD
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Minimum payload size in a signed payload (4 bytes)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: SIGNED_PAYLOAD_MAX_PAYLOAD
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Maximum payload size in a signed payload (64 bytes)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: CLAIMABLE_BALANCE_DISCRIMINANT_SIZE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Size of the claimable balance type discriminant (1 byte)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: VERSION_BYTE_SHIFT
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Bit shift amount used in version byte encoding (3 bits)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: ED25519_PUBLIC_KEY_BASE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Base value for ed25519 public key version byte (6, shifted becomes 48)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: MED25519_PUBLIC_KEY_BASE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Base value for muxed ed25519 public key version byte (12, shifted becomes 96)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: ED25519_SECRET_SEED_BASE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Base value for ed25519 secret seed version byte (18, shifted becomes 144)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: PREAUTH_TX_BASE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Base value for pre-authorized transaction version byte (19, shifted becomes 152)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: SHA256_HASH_BASE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Base value for SHA-256 hash version byte (23, shifted becomes 184)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: SIGNED_PAYLOAD_BASE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Base value for signed payload version byte (15, shifted becomes 120)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: CONTRACT_BASE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Base value for contract version byte (2, shifted becomes 16)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: LIQUIDITY_POOL_BASE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Base value for liquidity pool version byte (11, shifted becomes 88)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: CLAIMABLE_BALANCE_BASE
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Base value for claimable balance version byte (1, shifted becomes 8)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: ASSET_CODE_MIN_LENGTH
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Minimum asset code length (1 character)

Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.name: ASSET_CODE_ALPHANUM4_MAX_LENGTH
Structs/StellarProtocolConstants.html#/s.abstract: Maximum asset code length for AlphaNum4 assets (4 characters)

Enums/GetJWTTokenResponseEnum.html#/s:10.name: success(jwtToken:)
Enums/GetJWTTokenResponseEnum.html#/s:10.abstract: Successfully completed SEP-10 authentication and received JWT token.

Enums/GetJWTTokenResponseEnum.html#/s:10.name: failure(error:)
Enums/GetJWTTokenResponseEnum.html#/s:10.abstract: Failed to complete authentication due to request, validation, or signing error.

Enums/ChallengeResponseEnum.html#/s:10st.name: failure(error:)
Enums/ChallengeResponseEnum.html#/s:10st.abstract: Failed to retrieve challenge due to network or server error.

Enums/WebAuthenticatorForDomainEnum.html.abstract: Successfully created WebAuthenticator instance with endpoint from stellar.toml.

Enums/WebAuthenticatorForDomainEnum.html.name: failure(error:)
Enums/WebAuthenticatorForDomainEnum.html.abstract: Failed to create authenticator due to invalid domain, malformed TOML, or missing WEB_AUTH_ENDPOINT.

Enums/GetJWTTokenError.html#/s:10stellar.name: requestError(_:)
Enums/GetJWTTokenError.html#/s:10stellar.abstract: Network or server request failed during SEP-10 authentication flow.

Enums/GetJWTTokenError.html#/s:10stellar.name: parsingError(_:)
Enums/GetJWTTokenError.html#/s:10stellar.abstract: Failed to parse server response or transaction data.

Enums/GetJWTTokenError.html#/s:10stellar.name: validationErrorError(_:)
Enums/GetJWTTokenError.html#/s:10stellar.abstract: Challenge transaction validation failed due to security or protocol violation.

Enums/GetJWTTokenError.html#/s:10stellar.name: signingError
Enums/GetJWTTokenError.html#/s:10stellar.abstract: Failed to sign the challenge transaction with the provided signing key.

Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.name: sequenceNumberNot0
Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.abstract: The transaction sequence number is not 0 as required by SEP-10.

Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.name: invalidSourceAccount
Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.abstract: The source account of an operation does not match the expected account.

Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.name: sourceAccountNotFound
Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.abstract: An operation is missing the required source account field.

Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.name: invalidOperationType
Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.abstract: An operation type is not allowed in the challenge transaction.

Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.name: invalidOperationCount
Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.abstract: The number of operations in the challenge transaction is invalid.

Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.name: invalidHomeDomain
Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.abstract: The home domain in the challenge does not match the expected domain.

Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.name: invalidTimeBounds
Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.abstract: The transaction time bounds are invalid or expired.

Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.name: invalidSignature
Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.abstract: The server signature on the challenge transaction is invalid.

Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.name: signatureNotFound
Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.abstract: The required server signature is missing from the challenge transaction.

Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.name: validationFailure
Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.abstract: General validation failure occurred during challenge verification.

Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.name: invalidTransactionType
Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.abstract: The transaction type is not supported for SEP-10 challenges.

Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.name: invalidWebAuthDomain
Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.abstract: The web_auth_domain value does not match the authentication endpoint domain.

Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.name: memoAndMuxedSourceAccountFound
Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.abstract: Both a memo and muxed source account were provided, which is not allowed.

Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.name: invalidMemoType
Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.abstract: The memo type in the challenge transaction is not the expected type.

Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.name: invalidMemoValue
Enums/ChallengeValidationError.html#/s:1.abstract: The memo value does not match the expected value.

Enums/WebAuthenticatorError.html#/s:10st.name: invalidDomain
Enums/WebAuthenticatorError.html#/s:10st.abstract: The provided domain is not a valid URL or domain format.

Enums/WebAuthenticatorError.html#/s:10st.name: invalidToml
Enums/WebAuthenticatorError.html#/s:10st.abstract: The stellar.toml file could not be parsed or is malformed.

Enums/WebAuthenticatorError.html#/s:10st.name: noAuthEndpoint
Enums/WebAuthenticatorError.html#/s:10st.abstract: The stellar.toml file does not specify a WEB_AUTH_ENDPOINT.

Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.name: pendingExternal
Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.abstract: deposit/withdrawal has been submitted to external network, but is not yet confirmed. This is the status when waiting on Bitcoin or other external crypto network to complete a transaction, or when waiting on a bank transfer.

Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.name: pendingAnchor
Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.abstract: deposit/withdrawal is being processed internally by anchor

Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.name: pendingStellar
Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.abstract: deposit/withdrawal operation has been submitted to Stellar network, but is not yet confirmed

Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.name: pendingTrust
Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.abstract: the user must add a trust-line for the asset for the deposit to complete

Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.name: pendingUser
Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.abstract: the user must take additional action before the deposit / withdrawal can complete

Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.name: pendingUserTransferStart
Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.abstract: the user has not yet initiated their transfer to the anchor. This is the necessary first step in any deposit or withdrawal flow.

Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.name: pendingUserTransferComplete
Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.abstract: means the Stellar payment has been successfully received by the anchor and the off-chain funds are available for the customer to pick up. Only used for withdrawal transactions.

Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.name: pendingCustomerInfoUpdate
Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.abstract: certain pieces of information need to be updated by the user.

Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.name: pendingTransactionInfoUpdate
Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.abstract: certain pieces of information need to be updated by the user.

Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.name: incomplete
Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.abstract: there is not yet enough information for this transaction to be initiated. Perhaps the user has not yet entered necessary info in an interactive flow.

Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.name: noMarket
Enums/AnchorTransactionStatus.html#/s:10.abstract: could not complete deposit because no satisfactory asset/XLM market was available to create the account

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: links
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Navigation links related to this transaction (self, account, ledger, operations, effects, precedes, succeeds).

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: id
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Unique identifier for this transaction in Horizon’s database.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: pagingToken
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Paging token for cursor-based pagination.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: transactionHash
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Hex-encoded SHA-256 hash of the transaction’s XDR-encoded form. This is the transaction ID.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: ledger
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Ledger sequence number in which this transaction was included and applied.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: createdAt
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Timestamp when this transaction was included in the ledger (ISO 8601).

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: sourceAccount
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Account ID (public key) that originated this transaction.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: sourceAccountMuxed
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Multiplexed account address if the source account uses muxed accounts. Nil otherwise.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: sourceAccountMuxedId
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Muxed account ID component if the source account uses muxed accounts. Nil otherwise.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: sourceAccountSequence
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Sequence number of the source account when this transaction was submitted.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: maxFee
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Maximum fee (in stroops) the source account was willing to pay for this transaction.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: feeCharged
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Actual fee (in stroops) charged for this transaction. May be less than maxFee.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: feeAccount
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Account that paid the transaction fee. Usually same as source account unless fee bump was used.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: feeAccountMuxed
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Multiplexed account address if the fee account uses muxed accounts. Nil otherwise.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: feeAccountMuxedId
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Muxed account ID component if the fee account uses muxed accounts. Nil otherwise.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: operationCount
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Number of operations contained in this transaction.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: memoType
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Type of memo attached to this transaction: “none”, “text”, “id”, “hash”, or “return”.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: memo
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Parsed memo object. Nil for memo type “none”.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: signatures
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Array of base64-encoded signatures (decorated signatures) for this transaction.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: transactionEnvelope
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Complete transaction envelope containing the transaction and all signatures (XDR decoded).

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: transactionResult
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Result of transaction execution indicating success or specific error codes (XDR decoded).

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: transactionMeta
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Metadata about ledger state changes caused by this transaction (XDR decoded). Nil if not available.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: feeMeta
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Metadata about ledger changes from paying the transaction fee (XDR decoded). Nil if not available.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: feeBumpTransactionResponse
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Details about the fee bump transaction if this transaction was wrapped in a fee bump. Nil otherwise.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: innerTransactionResponse
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Details about the inner transaction if this response is for a fee bump transaction. Nil otherwise.

Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.name: preconditions
Classes/TransactionResponse.html#/s:10st.abstract: Preconditions that must be met for this transaction to be valid (time bounds, ledger bounds, etc.). Nil if none.

Classes/TransactionPreconditionsResponse.name: timeBounds
Classes/TransactionPreconditionsResponse.abstract: Time window (Unix timestamps) during which this transaction is valid. Nil if no time constraints.

Classes/TransactionPreconditionsResponse.name: ledgerBounds
Classes/TransactionPreconditionsResponse.abstract: Ledger sequence range during which this transaction is valid. Nil if no ledger constraints.

Classes/TransactionPreconditionsResponse.name: minAccountSequence
Classes/TransactionPreconditionsResponse.abstract: Minimum source account sequence number required. Transaction invalid if account sequence is less. Nil if no constraint.

Classes/TransactionPreconditionsResponse.name: minAccountSequenceAge

An account can have an arbitrary amount of DataEntries attached to it. Each DataEntry increases the minimum balance needed to be held by the account.
